title: The Unmaking
goal: Discover the political fallout of the city's destruction.
stakes_shift: New factions emerge to fill the power vacuum.

bridge.to_next: Entering the ruins of the capital.

scenes.summary: They find the ruins of Aethelgard occupied by warlords fighting over the remaining tech.
scenes.outcome: The world is falling into lawlessness.

scenes.summary: Kaelen has to use his reputation to stop a massacre.
scenes.outcome: He realizes his name still carries weight.

scenes.summary: Lyra returns to the Academy's ruins and finds a hidden vault that survived.
scenes.outcome: The vault contains maps to other 'Rifts' across the continent.

scenes.summary: She finds a letter from her father, revealing he was part of the original conspiracy.
A messenger from the Southern Kingdoms arrives, demanding the shard.
Kaelen and Lyra realize they must hide the maps before they are seized.
scenes.outcome: They decide to leave the city and go into hiding.

scenes.summary: A shadow moves in the corner of the vault—something followed them from the Rift.
scenes.outcome: The threat is not entirely gone.
